Each house in this village tells a part of my story — About Me, Work Experience, and Education. Walk up to one and press Space to enter!
Feel free to explore! Use arrow keys, WASD, or click to move around.

entries.title: Introduction
entries.description: Applied Scientist with 10+ years of experience across AI, machine learning, and data science. Currently working on cutting-edge LLM evaluation and multi-modal content generation at AWS.

entries.title: Core Expertise

entries.title: Patent
